messages.text: Good morning, welcome to Duroflex COCO ADYAR. Am I audible?

messages.text: Yes, I can hear you. I'm looking for Back Magic Mattress. I have back issues.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Understood. The Back Magic Mattress is our best-seller. Let me show you why.

messages.text: [Showing Product] Notice the quality of materials used here.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Interesting. What's the price range?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: The price starts from ₹25,000 with current festive offers.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Let me think about it. Can I visit the store?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Absolutely! We're open 10 AM to 8 PM. Shall I send you the location?

Overall_Summary.Agent_Handling_Summary: Anjali demonstrated moderate product knowledge and adequate communication skills. Could improve on creating urgency and cross-selling. Overall professional handling with room for growth in value addition.
Overall_Summary.Customer_Satisfaction_Summary: Customer had a satisfactory experience. Questions were thoroughly answered. Customer felt comfortable enough to commit to a store visit.
Overall_Summary.Next_Action: Store visit scheduled for weekend

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Good morning, welcome to Duroflex COCO ADYAR. Am I audible?

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Yes, I can hear you. I'm looking for Energise Memory Foam. Can you show me this?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Understood. The Energise Memory Foam is perfect for your needs. Let me show you why.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: [Showing Product] Notice the quality of materials used here.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: I see. Is this available for immediate delivery?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: It comes with a 7-year warranty against sagging.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Sounds good. What are the store timings?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Please do come. You should try it to really feel the support. I'll WhatsApp you the location?

Agent_Presentability.Reason_for_Score: Professional appearance with branded uniform. Clean background showing product displays.

Primary_Questions_Asked: Is this suitable for side sleepers?

Product_Demonstration.Customer_Engagement_Reason: Lectured without pausing for customer input

Reasons: Offered to send location via WhatsApp
Could have been more specific about timing

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Good morning, welcome to Duroflex COCO LAJPAT NAGAR DELHI. Am I audible?

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Yes, I can hear you. I'm looking for Neuma Pocket Spring. I have back issues.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Understood. The Neuma Pocket Spring is our best-seller. Let me show you why.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: [Pressing Mattress] You see this resistance? This is the high-density layer.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: That looks good. What is the warranty?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: The price starts from ₹25,000 with current festive offers.

messages.speaker: customer
messages.text: Let me think about it. Can I visit the store?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Absolutely! We're open 10 AM to 8 PM. Shall I send you the location?

Agent_Presentability.Reason_for_Score: Well-groomed with Duroflex branded attire. Background is organized and professional.
